concept.title: Terminology
concept.shortdesc: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT, "RECOMMEND", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in [RFC 2119] and [RFC8174] when, and only when, they appear in all capitals, as shown here.

draft-comment.author: Kristen J Eberlein
draft-comment.p: This is OASIS boiler plate. Ideally, we'd include information here about the following:

ul.li: Visual formatting of the normative statements
Maybe verbiage about how we use normative statements: focus on interoperability and NOT using them for things that are enforced by the grammar files
